pddl4j.exp.action
Class DurativeAction

java.lang.Object
  pddl4j.exp.action.AbstractActionDef
      pddl4j.exp.action.DurativeAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Term>, ActionDef
public class DurativeAction
extends AbstractActionDef

This class implements a durative action of the PDDl language.

See Also:

standardize

public DurativeAction standardize()
Standardizes all occurrences of the variables that occur in this expression. a standardized copy of this expression.

Returns:
a standardized copy of this expression.

normalize

public DurativeAction normalize()
Normalize this action. This method returns a copy of this action where:
  • each variable is standardized,
  • duration constraints expression is convert into conjunctive prenex normal form and
  • condition expression is convert into disjunctive prenex normal form and
  • effect expression is is convert into conjunctive prenex normal form.

      • Returns:
      a normalize copy of this action.
      See Also:
      Exp.toPrenexNormaForm(), Exp.toConjunctiveNormalForm(), Exp.toDisjunctiveNormalForm()
